com.lib.pygmy

Interface GameLevel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PygmyGameLevel

    public interface GameLevel
    Encapsulates the state of a game level, namely its configuration and its universe.
    Author:
    Pygmy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addEntity(GameEntity entity)
      Adds a game entity to the level's universe

      Returns the level's board type

      Returns the tile colors of the level's board

      Returns the level's number of rows
